title: ** Cancel Basic Authentication
preconditions: The user has navigated to the basic authentication page.
The user has not yet entered any authentication credentials.
main_flow: The user presses the Cancel button on the basic authentication page.
The system prompts the user to sign in.
The user is redirected to the original page without entering any authentication credentials.
4. The browser page opens, and the text "Not authorized" is displayed.
postconditions: The browser page displays the text "Not authorized".
The user is not redirected to any other page.
